tool_description: Get the basic metadata on all breeds of cats from around the world.

api_list.name: Paginated
api_list.description: Get all cat breed results in a set of 10 per page.

api_list.name: Order by Descending
api_list.description: Gives a list of all cats sorted in descending order by name.

required_parameters.name: ordering
required_parameters.description: Parameter to specify the ordering criteria.

api_list.name: Order by Ascending
api_list.description: Gives a list of all cats sorted in ascending order by name.

required_parameters.name: ordering
required_parameters.description: Parameter to specify the ordering criteria.

api_list.name: Origin
api_list.description: Gives a list of all cats with the origin country.

required_parameters.name: origin
required_parameters.description: Parameter to specify the origin country.

api_list.name: Fur Color
api_list.description: Gives a list of all cats with the specified fur color.

required_parameters.name: furColor__icontains
required_parameters.description: Parameter to specify the fur color.

api_list.name: Breed Type
api_list.description: Gives all results by the type of breed.

required_parameters.name: breedType
required_parameters.description: Parameter to specify the type of breed.

required_parameters.name: search
required_parameters.description: Keyword to search for a specific cat breed.

api_list.name: Single Cat Breed
api_list.description: Gives details of a single cat breed.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Parameter to specify the ID of the cat breed.

api_list.name: All Cats
api_list.description: Get a list of all Cats with their basic meta data.
